question: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has been awarded a commemorative World War II medal by which country?
explanation:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has awarded Kim Jong Un a commemorative World War II medal marking the 75th anniversary of the victory over Nazi Germany.
As per the notification of the Russian embassy, the medal was awarded to the Prime Minister of North Korea to recognise his role in preserving the memory of Soviet soldiers who laid down their lives in the territory of North Korea.
